description: This file contains CMake functions, macros, and commands for managing dependencies, target properties, installation procedures, and configuration files within a CMake-based build system. It defines utility functions for handling library linkages, include directories, compile options, and package/component configuration generation, tailored for a specific project or namespace.

methods.name: add_element
methods.description: Macro to append an element to a list variable.

methods.name: _get_default_link_name
methods.description: Function to parse a library filename and extract its base name and directory.

methods.name: get_if_link_libraries
methods.description: Function to retrieve link libraries and directories of a target, resolving dependencies recursively.

methods.name: get_if_compile_defines
methods.description: Function to gather compile definitions from a target and its dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_compile_options
methods.description: Function to gather compile options from a target and its dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_include_dirs
methods.description: Function to gather include directories from a target and its dependencies.

methods.name: InstallCMakeConfig
methods.description: Function to generate and install a CMake config file for a library target.

methods.name: InstallPackageConfig
methods.description: Function to generate and install a pkg-config style configuration file for a target.

methods.name: InstallFindModule
methods.description: Function to install CMake find modules (*.cmake files) from a specified directory.

methods.name: print_properties
methods.description: Utility to print all CMake property list options.

methods.name: print_target_properties
methods.description: Utility to print all properties of a specified target.

methods.name: semicolon_safe_string
methods.description: Escapes semicolons in a string to make it safe for CMake syntax.

methods.name: InstallCompatibleCMakeConfig
methods.description: Generates an interface target compatible with legacy include/header paths and links for distribution.
